code: import React from'react';import{MOOD_LABELS,MOOD_COLORS}from'../../utils/constants';import'./MoodSlider.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MoodSlider=_ref=>{let{value,onChange,disabled=false}=_ref;const handleChange=e=>{onChange(parseInt(e.target.value));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mood-slider",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"mood-slider-label",children:"How are you feeling today?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mood-slider-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"range",min:"1",max:"10",value:value,onChange:handleChange,disabled:disabled,className:"mood-slider-input",style:{background:"linear-gradient(to right, ".concat(MOOD_COLORS[1]," 0%, ").concat(MOOD_COLORS[10]," 100%)")}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mood-slider-display",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mood-value",style:{color:MOOD_COLORS[value]},children:value}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mood-label",children:MOOD_LABELS[value]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mood-scale",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Terrible (1)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Amazing (10)"})]})]});};export default MoodSlider;
